title: Perform Scenario Analysis on Financial Plan
description: An FP&A analyst needs to model the impact of a potential recession (e.g., a 10% drop in sales) on the company's financial plan.

tasks.description: Create a new 'what-if' scenario based on the current financial plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a copy of the plan labeled 'Recession Scenario'.

tasks.description: Adjust the key drivers in the scenario (e.g., decrease sales growth by 10%).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully modifies the assumptions in the new scenario.

tasks.description: Run the scenario and compare the projected P&L against the base plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the model and generates a comparison report showing the impact on profitability.
